chunk Struct Reference


Data Fields

unsigned long int chunk_size
void * mem_chunk
struct chunk * nextFree

Detailed Description

this is a list of free memory chunks (pieces), the size of each chunk is specified before it's address that means, for example if chunk1 is the address the first chunk of free memory, so it's size is in the address : chunk1 - sizeof(unsigned long int) use the function mem_firstFit_get_chunk_size() to get the size
